pr_title: Revert "Support for Kafka broker message format bump for passthrough BMM"

timeline.message:
Revert "Support for Kafka broker message format bump for passthrough BMM (#732)"

This reverts commit 079d80d4fe9726d37110cb4eb8e4de1680969228.

The code changes in com.linkedin.kafka.clients:li-apache-kafka-clients to support the broker message format bump for passthrough
introduced a significant performance regression. Due to this, for now we will revert support for the message format bump.
Once their performance regression is solved, we will add back support.

timeline.bodyText: @somandal this was not part of the original commit that you're reverting. Just checking if it's intentional.
timeline.author: jzakaryan

replies.bodyText: Yes this is intentional. Kafka reverted the changes on their end in this version. I just want to bump this up for any OSS users that might be using passthrough so that they don't run into a performance regression.
replies.author: somandal
